pr_title: Updated handling of set and add in TypeSafeArrayInstanceList - (Task #705)

timeline.message:
Update handling of set and add in AArrayInstanceList - (Task #705)

Now set is also allowed for static lists. Now add on a static lists
works calls a set with an internal pointer.
Updated the test cases.

---
Task #705: Improve handling of static lists in AArrayInstanceList

Task #705: Improve handling of static lists in AArrayInstanceList

Use TypeSafeArrayInstanceList instead - (Task #705)

Now add and set work only on elements with the same uuid.
